name: LUNA™ Mini 3
categories: Skincare, High Tech Tools, Facial Cleansing Brushes
about: What it is:A compact, gym-bag-friendly cleansing device that offers a 30-second glow boost mode for fast yet gentle facial cleansing..What Else You Need to Know:LUNA™ Mini 3 is the only gym-bag-friendly cleansing device specially designed to care for active skin. Gentle yet powerful T-Sonic™ pulsations and extra-soft touchpoints work together to effortlessly remove dirt, oil, and sweat for fresh, visibly glowing skin..Clinical Results:In a 28-day consumer trial with 50 participants:.- 100% reported more radiant skin
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To unlock LUNA™ Mini 3, pair with the FOREO For You app. Once paired and settings decided, device can be used without the app.-Remove all makeup, dampen skin, and then apply your FOREO cleanser (sold separately)..-Press the universal button once for cleansing mode or quick-press twice for the glow-boost cleansing mode.**.-Cleanse using circular movements on cheeks and forehead, gliding up and down the nose..-Press and hold button for three seconds to turn off device..-Rinse and pat your face dry. Apply your favorite skincare products...**Device will automatically switch off after 30 seconds in glow-boost mode.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the FOREO VoxBox and I'm ready to tell you about the FOREO LUNA Mini 3 device, its functions, how effective it is, and how to connect this device with your phone. I already have the FOREO devices in my arsenal and I was very interested to try the new FOREO LUNA Mini 3. All FOREO devices work through Bluetooth. First of all, you must make the connection between your phone and LUNA Mini 3 before first use. Just download the FOREO App, find your device ( you must scan the barcode on the bottom of your device), write the date and upload the picture of your proof of purchase, and Voila, it's connected! After this step, you can start to use your device and you don't need to pair it with the phone again before each use. If you never tried the FOREO devices before, you need it in your life. It makes your skincare routine simpler, more effective, deeper cleanse and it absolutely changes your skin! In the app settings, you can change the CLEANSING TIME, INTENSITY, and even the GLOW MODE. The new device is so smart. It is very simple to work with, even if you don't have experience with these devices before. If you can't find your LUNA in your own house, don't worry, just choose the function FIND MY DEVICE, and your LUNA will let you know where it's hiding. The bristles of the device are so soft, the size is perfect ( it's not too small and not too large), and you can even carry it in your purse! If you want some changes in your skincare routine, I recommend to start with the FOREO devices. It can be a great gift for your besties!

reviews.review_title: APP IS NOT REQUIRED TO TURN ON! (see photo)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the luna mini 3 over a year ago and was just scrolling through reviews recently when I noticed several saying it requires an app to turn on. THIS IS NOT TRUE! So I’m writing this review for the sole purpose of explaining the app. The Luna mini 3 may require the app for initial setup because you set the timing and intensity to be used for each section of your face. (See photo!) Once those are set then you don’t need to use the app again unless you want to change the settings. I was able to connect with bluetooth easily on iphone and android. Once you have your settings saved, you push the power button twice for the timed/intensity routine you set, or once for a 30 second super intense mode. The app also allows you to upload a proof of purchase for warranty reasons. I repeat, YOU DON’T NEED THE APP TO TURN THE DEVICE ON! My guess is people aren’t setting the routine and perhaps that’s why the device won’t turn on. One of the selling factors of the mini 3 is that you can customize the routine!  As for the device itself, I purchased it when Clarisonic was discontinued. I think I preferred my Clarisonic but this device works and I like that i can turn down the intensity and timing. It’s a bit big for small crevices but it works. I have the luna play go too and sometimes prefer it more simply because it’s smaller.

reviews.review_text: Before using Foreo Luna Mini 3, I used the Clarisonic pro brush and I would break out quite often. However, after using Foreo, I noticed a huge difference with my skin. I had less breakouts and face feels so much cleaner. This is my go to face cleansing tool every morning and night! I can’t live without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am just sooooooo HAPPY I got it. AMAZING tool!!!! My face feels soooo much cleaner and softer. Before, I would normally take so much longer with my hands and my face still wouldn’t feel as clean. I find it so much easier and quicker as well. It has duration of 60 sec to prevent from overusing. And has little pause in between so you know to move to different part of the face. I don’t lose focus like I normally do with my old long wash lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, very high quality. I only use it in the am bc it’s not as strong as my Clarisonic & doesn’t take off makeup residue/ tinted moisturizer/ spf well but it’s good if you need a gentle clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used the Foreo Luna Mini 2 for four years, I’ve finally decided to upgrade to the Mini 3. Despite the reviews I’ve seen on here, I absolutely love this device and the app is not so much an issue. It can be used without the app.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle and it's so much better than the clarisonic

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m new to Luna and this is the first device I bought. Since my first use, I’ve found it really confusing. Like many people already mentioned you need to turn on the device with the app, which means the device can’t be used in shower cause I’ll have to step out of the bathtub in the middle of shower to bring my phone to use it. I don’t want to get my phone wet so usually I keep it away from the bathtub when I shower so in order to use this device I need to wash my face before I shower. I understand the registration thing but it would be much more convenient for users to have a button on the device so once it’s set with the app you can just start your cleaning routine by pressing the button.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Get the Luna 2 instead!!!!!  You have to connect to your phone to wash your face, which is stupid in my opinion! I would rather have the button on the machine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the way it left my skin, it leave it soft and clean. With the time my skin turned no texture and with less oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a huge fan of the Luna mini 2 so I decided to upgrade to the Luna mini 3. Just like others are saying, to even turn the device on and use it you have to connect it via Bluetooth to their app on your phone. Even if all you want to do is just wash your face. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I switched from a Clarisonic to this device after Clarisonic closed down. Although the battery life is much better than the Clarisonic and I appreciate not needing to purchase expensive brush heads that get grimy, I preferred the Clarisonic to the Foreo because the strong vibration made my skin feel cleaner. This device is hard to use around the nose and hairline (pulls your hair). Especially for the price, it's not my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: GREAT PRODUCT   after I finally figured out how to use it, which is via an app(not a fan of) but my skin can doit BABY soft! Even after the first use!  Other than being forced to using the app to make it work. It’s a good product!

reviews.review_title: STOPPED WORKING IN LESS THAN A MONTH
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the product and it made my skin feel so soft but mine stopped working less than a month of usage, it just wouldn’t turn on anymore and Sephora did not let me return or exchange it and said I had to return it to the manufacturer for review and it was a hassle overall that made my experience a bad one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the luna because it has helped me exfoliate my skin without leaving my face feeling harsh and raw afterwards. I love you soft the exfoliating bristles feel on my face after I've used the cleanser, my skin has never looked so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best Skincare tool I have ever used! After every use it makes my skin feel so soft. I love how it has a adjuster so if it is to aggressive you can simmer it down. I bought it on sale at TSC so I can't say anything on the price but If you have been looking for something to apply your cleanser I would splurge. I have sensitive skin that can be easily agitated and this doesn't bother my skin. It also lasts so long after one charge. I swear by this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for just under a week.  I have noticed a significant improvement in my skin, especially with congestion. Mask life has been tough on my skin, this, along with my regular care and facials have made my skin so much clearer and healthier looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After recently becoming a mom I noticed a dramatic change in my skin (probably due to exhaustion lol) but my normally “normal” skin became much more dry and random breakouts when I NEVER get breakouts.  Decided to get this as I learned clairisonic doesn’t make the Mia anymore and I am soooo happy with it! only a week so far but my skin is super supple and SOFT like never before. Even my boyfriend wants one now lol because of how soft my skin is!   Takes exactly 1 minute which is good because I don’t have a lot of free time and I use this with my Philosophy Purity Cleanser and my skin looks amazinggggg in one week. I would recommend to anyone to get this!!!! you won’t regret it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a happily faithful Clairsonic user for YEARS. I was so disappointed when they stopped making their brush heads. I admit I did not want to make a change. But finally I decided to give a Foreo a try. WOW! My skin is baby soft after each use. It is an absolutely fantastic device. I love the mini as well & glad I chose this size. I now understand the loyalty & all the fuss. I am truly glad I decided to finally try it out... lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much! It has changed the skin care game for me! I have been trying my best to find the best tools to help me with my skin. This has helped me to clean my oily skin after wearing a full face of makeup. I have had no problems at all and I have had it for about 6 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best thing that has ever happened to my face! My skin feels so baby soft now and it is so nice that it only needs a charge every 6 months. Such a great product!

reviews.review_title: Would recommend for sensitive, combo & oily skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have had the Foreo for over a month now. I made this purchase due to the fact the Clarisonic Mia had gone out of business. I was skeptical at first. If the scilicone brush heads would penetrate into the skin. Once I set up the right intensity it cleaned just as well. And no more reusable brush heads!  My partner purchased one as well. They have larger and oily pores and rosacea. We have noticed as significant change in their skin. Gentle and effective. Though, the product for me was a little temperamental to set up with bluetooth, when I first opened it. But their customer service team was great to deal with. Once you get it set up with the app, you will not need to use it, or your phone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to replace my Clarisonic after it died a painful death of constantly vibrating one night and it ended out in the yard.  Unfortunately I don’t feel this device cleanses my skin as great as other reviewers.  Maybe I’m just using it wrong but I have more makeup left on my cotton pad from my toner than I ever did with my Clarisonic.  The app is useless once it’s set up, so not sure why they make it the only way to “activate” the device.  The only saving grace is that I had gift cards and only paid about $20 for it.  I feel I would have done better just buying a cleansing brush. Also, I’ve been using for months and have yet to not have a dirty pad after use.

reviews.review_title: Dare I say, better than Clarisonic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like so many other Clarisonic users, I found out the sad news the company was going out of business and would no longer be making brush head replacements, so I started looking for something to replace my device and quickly came upon Foreo.   I love this device! It is cute, compact, way more travel friendly than my Clarisonic and comes with a little travel bag so it doesn't get gross in your luggage or bags, it's soft, it makes my skin feel cleansed, its easy to handle and fits well in my palm, its battery last forever, it has antibacterial silicone, and the best part, I dont have to spend money to replace its head every few months. I know a lot of people are talking about the app, but I had zero issues with it. Had my Foreo registered and set up within minutes.   I would highly recommend getting the Luna Mini 3. In my honest opinion you don't need to spend more money to get the bigger one either, this does the job and is now my tried and true. Hope this helps someone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I waited over a month before writing a review, because I wanted to be sure how much I liked this! I have been using a Clarisonic every single day since 2012. Unfortunately I had no idea that they were going to discontinue them and didn’t know until I needed a new brush head! Anyway, I was really skeptical about this device to replace my tried and true, but I really love this! I was worried with some of the iffy reviews, but my only complaint was that it was a little annoying to set this up with the app, but after I did, I haven’t even had to mess with the app. So don’t let that talk you out of buying this! I love how much cleaner this is in comparison to my old brushes and that I’m not spending so much on those replacement heads! I also like that is smaller and easier to travel with. I went back and forth trying to decide if I wanted the mini or regular, but I LOVE the size of this one! I don’t notice a big difference in the cleansing aspect compared to the Clarisonic, but I do think the Luna is more hygienic and easier to clean than those expensive brush heads in the long run.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does make my skin care routine easier, and my skin is softer, but the question is it worth 160 big ones, can you live with out it , and the answer is yes. But if you have 160.00 carefree dollars laying around, go for it, it does work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the Foreo Luna Mini 3 to replace my Clarisonic after I uses my last replacement head. I don’t like the Foreo as much as my Clarisonic, but it gets the job done. I find that the shape is a bit awkward to use, but I’ve gotten more used to it. Like many others reviewing Foreo devices have noted, the app is complete garbage. While trying to register my device, I kept getting a message saying that the device was already registered. I chatted with support and was told this was a known issue that would be fixed with an app update, but no timeline for when that update would come. I was also told the device was unusable without that app update to address the registration issue. I was quite annoyed to have purchased this device to only be told it couldn’t be used for some unknown amount of time. I went ahead and tried to turn the device on and found that their support was not right. The device could be used without registering it by simply pressing the power button to turn it on. I was finally able to register my device a week or so after I got it (no update from Foreo, I just decided to try again and it worked). The app isn’t the most intuitive to use, doesn’t have any instructions, and doesn’t offer that much value. I did change the intensity level on my device, but I don’t imagine I’ll ever need to use the app again unless I buy another product. I’ll continue using this product, but really miss my Clarisonic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVE the mini 3. I did follow some youtube videos for recommendations with the app. Set the app up first and set your intensity settings. After you set them if you’re just washing your face daily with it there’s no need to go back to the app. Turn it on and it remembers your settings. It vibrates after 15 seconds so you can change to a different section of your face based off your settings intensity will change. I’ve used it daily for 3 weeks now and haven’t been back to the app yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is a nice brush and the glow after use is real but I just to like how you to connect to the app to use a brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even my esthetician noticed the difference in my skin. I’ve been using this tool 1-2 times a day consistently for over a month now.  I had been using it in that way for about a month when I saw my esthetician and when she looked at my face, she said, Oh, nice! Your skin is really improving!   Adding this tool was the only thing that changed. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is 4 1/2 stars because you have to use the app to change the intensity settings and sometimes you don’t want to use the app. This face cleansing tool really works and it helps clean your skin and keeps it smooth and gives it a mini exfoliation. Would recommend the device. I just don’t like the app because sometimes it crashes and sometimes my settings doesn’t save,when I change the settings; so I have to go back and do it all over again it’s kind of a hassle. Had problems registering the device because the makers of the device didn’t really make it easy to find where the product registration number is and if you went to help they were giving instructions to find it from the previous devices. (not sure if things have changed, haven’t bothered with the app since changing of settings.) it’s easy to clean & I haven’t charged it since I got it back in May 2020. Love the colour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do enjoy using this product. I feel like my skin feels smoother after each use and it helps get the dead skin off me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok:  I’ve used earlier versions of this, and if you don’t like having your phone nearby to get it to work, get an earlier version.   But boy, in the shower, this is the best thing out there that will clean my skin and my sinuses.  The ‘glow’ setting really liberated the cause of a sinus headache and I am breathing a ton better from my usual chronic sinusitis.  Just my two cents. For me, the glowing skin is a happy side effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It works just fine, but its shape makes it impossible to use in some smaller area like around the bridge/side of your nose (it's too big and there are no bristles on the actual edge of the device). The app is kind of dumb, but once you set it up to your preference, there's no need to use it. Simply press the button to start the previously defined cycle and long-press the button to turn off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's pretty cool! It uses a phone app to operate. The bristles are soft but hard enough to really scrub your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to be a downer, but I’ve been using this Foreo and the Sephora Pore Precision cleansing pad($9) and there is really no difference between the type of cleansing they provide. The Foreo disconnects from the app constantly and it’s not that comfortable to hold. Unfortunately I’ve returned mine. I will pick up a few more of the Sephora pads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never used a facial brush but started getting hormonal acne in my 40's and needed to try something new, so I got the Mini 3. I've been using it for a few weeks now and from the first use my skin felt softer and definitely appears to be clearer - no new breakouts yet!   The brush itself is a good size, soft, and easy to maintain. Gentle enough to use twice a day. I haven't had to charge it again since I got it, so it holds a charge well. I downloaded the app but haven't really had a chance to dig in, so I can't speak to that part.   If the price tag doesn't turn you off, this little tool is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've heard a lot about this device for the longest time. I was skeptical at first due to the mixed reviews and took me a good 6 months to decide if it was worth the money. I've had facial brushes before but it always irritated my sensitive skin (either broke me out or just made my skin raw) so I ended up just sticking to the basics and stopped using facial brushes all together.   I noticed my skincare routine needed an upgrade, and required something that was gentle yet effective at removing excess oil, dirt, and makeup. I was tired of products saying this will fix all your skin problems. Having hormonal acne really sucks and having to constantly spend money on products that say they work but don't was not only a waste of time but was a waste of money.   After doing some more research and asking a friend about her Luna device, I decided to save up and give it a try. I'm really happy I did. Like other users, the app can be confusing at first but if you just youtube how to register your Luna Mini 3 there were many videos that break it down on how to use it. Overall, I say it's worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this device. At first it was a learning curve but it help enhanced my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the same Clarisonic for over eight years and it recently stopped holding a charge, so I decided to mix it up and get a FOREO. I was skeptical that I’d like it, as I thought I’d miss traditional brush bristles - but I was pleasantly surprised! I like how it fits in my hand, how many uses you get per charge, the fun color and the overall ease of use (although I agree with reviewers who don’t like the app - it’s confusing and I couldn’t get it to register my device so I gave up and kept the default settings - minus one star.) I wouldn’t say I notice a big difference in my skin texture or tone, but I’m a happy convert due to how clean my skin feels and how quick it gets the job done.

reviews.review_title: Get the mini 2, not the mini 3...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved my mini luna 2, but unfortunately misplaced it and had to replace it. I thought I would treat myself to what should have been a slight upgrade and purchased the mini 3, and boy do I wish I had just waited for the mini 2's to come back into stock. You have to download a god awful, bug ridden app before you can even get this brush to work! Honestly was not worth the hassle for features I won't even use. If you're just looking to get a tool to help clean your face get the mini 2. My device is so buggy because of the bluetooth, it drops connections, takes forever to turn on... definitely was a downgrade, not an upgrade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great tool to have. I don't really consider myself as acne prone but I do get hormonal acne right before my period. Using the Luna mini 3 has stopped that completely. I do not get any acne anymore and if I do it's the tiniest pimple. Gentle enough to use every night and I haven't had to recharge it since I purchased it (2 months ago with daily use).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The device doesn't work. Very disappointed on spending that much money on something defective

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to have a Clarisonic Mia Fit and I was not impressed with it to say the least. It cleaned just a bit better than washing my face without it, and didn’t help much with any blackheads or breakouts. Battery life was awful and constant replacing of brushes was getting expensive and annoying so after two years of dealing with it I finally decided to get rid of it. I was so hesitant to purchase Foreo since I somehow thought it would not clean my skin as well because silicone bristles are thicker than typical brush bristles but I was proven wrong fast. I received it 3 days ago and my skin is already glowing with no blackheads in sight, and it already minimized my pores. It’s definitely a game changer for oily/combination skin types. I honestly feel like I missed out by waiting too long and not purchasing it sooner. The only downside is that you have to install Foreo app before you can use it, I don’t think it should be necessary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It is easy to clean and gives a nice glow to the skin after using it. It has cleared up my skin and made it look really good! I love this product :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Skin feels great right after treatment! I use this 3 times a week and you can feel the exfoliation and treatment right after. Makes skin really smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally got this Mini 3.  The brush is extremely soft and comfortable when touching my skin, brush area is bigger than mini 2, more importantly this one is smart, can change the level of vibration on different areas of your face.  I used to use the mini 2, but feel like the sides of my nose is hard to be cleaned due to the brush bits size being slightly larger, which the mini 3 got much thinner brush, and it’s doing a much better job cleaning, and it does now dry out my skin after use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve recently received this product and I have to say that I’ve been missing out!! After using it, your skin feels so smooth and I notice a little bit of glow afterwards! The app isn’t as bad as people made it out to be, it’s really only needed if you want to change the intensity, which did its job for me! The size is also perfect, fits into the crevices of the face and leaves every bit feeling clean! I have nothing bad to say about this product, hope this was helpful!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Its like a mini facial massage. I find it leaves my skin feeling really clean yet still very soft. I do feel like my skin just looks better than it did when I just used my fingers to wash my face. I use it in the shower and haven't had any issues with water damage or anything like that so I will say it is waterproof as it claims. Also love that it is rechargeable, and haven't had to do that yet either! Also love that you can customize the vibration intensity and length to suit you (I've read people hate the app but I really didn't find it too hard to navigate at all, and once you have your settings all done you don't really need to use it anyway! I don't ever use the glow boost mode because it just seems to short of a time to actually clean your face, but I do use it at the end of the routine to just go over my nose really well. I love the size of it, I feel like the full size one would be too big. I do find it tough to get into the crease of my nose (I have a little nose so maybe that's just my issue?) But in the end I honestly really love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this! The size is perfect - I feel like anything bigger would be too much. I use this with a foaming cleanser day and night and my skin has never been smoother. 4 stars and not 5 because the app barely works and isn’t even needed. Not everything needs an app these days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had bad skin (oily, acne, discoloration, scars) my entire life.  I've tried every product and perscription under the sun.  Nothing has ever worked like the Foreo Luna.  Using this twice a day, with my mormal scrubs and cleansers  has been a game changer.  I noticed a difference after the first use; my skin was actually smooth and soft.  After a week, my skin was clear and healthly looking.  After two weeks the discoloration is starting to go away and my scars are almost gone.  I can't wait to see what my skin looks like after a month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this baby for almost 2 weeks now and it’s seems to be not working with blackheads around the nose area. I’ve done some research before purchasing this, I thought it removes blackhead. Asked customer service and said they don’t think it works for blackheads. Maybe it’s my fault that o thought this works for blackheads!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited when my Foreo arrived today!  The color is super cute and it fits in my hand perfectly. I like the customizable setting options via the app, but be aware that using your phone is the only way to change settings. This can be annoying for some people. Also, I’m not sure I buy into the claim that it analyzes your face - the app is confusing, has tons of connectivity issues and largely a waste of time. I bought the Luna 3 vs the 2 mostly for the longer bristles and design. If the app matters a lot to you, I would skip on this - otherwise it’s a great addition to your routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this little dude for a week and my skin has never felt softer. I feel that since using this the products I use after cleaning my face are working better. I'm glad got this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It's super soft and feels like I'm getting a face massage every morning in the shower. My skin feels great. The app is useless, but after registering, I use the product without the app with no issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the device I've been waiting for. I know about mini 2 and never get to buy it but last month I got this one as a present and I after few weeks of using it I can say I am very happy how thoroughly it cleans my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for myself a month ago, and it’s really worth it. My skin look brighter and it’s feels very ‘fresh’ when I use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it. I have noticed that her skin looks brighter and the acne she normally gets especially towards the end of the month, is significantly less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I’ve been waiting since last year for it to come out because I wanted the newest one and I didn’t want to buy the big one since it was so huge. It took me about an hour to get everything set up so now it works fine but setting up is the worst part! reviews.review_text: I’ve owned the original Luna Mini (still going strong since 2014) and tried the full size Luna 2, and the Luna Mini 3 is the best of the bunch. The longer bristles really do make a difference, and feel so much softer than the 1 and 2 (but the drawback is that the longer bristles trap more dead skin cells and water droplets). I also prefer the mini size, because it fits the contours of the face better and I never found the anti-aging mode on the full size to be effective. I decided to upgrade from the original because over time, I felt like the original bristles weren't flexible enough. And as my skincare routine got more advanced, the original wasn't doing anything extra for my skin that I couldn't achieve with actives. The Luna Mini 3 fixes those issues and complements my current skincare routine. My skin is more smooth, my makeup applies nicer, and I feel like my pores are less clogged. However, the app is awful. It has a bad user interface and frequent connectivity issues. The app is required for selecting intensity (0-12) and duration (60s-120s). There's also a quicker Glow boost mode that is intensity 12-16 and 30 seconds long. It's annoying if I want to change things up depending on how my skin is feeling that day, but I don't want to bother fiddling with my phone just to be able to wash my face. Another annoyance is that the duration is a minimum of 60 seconds, but I usually like to do less. I have to hold onto the power button for ~5 seconds before it will turn off. On the original Luna, power off was instant. The reviews for the full sized Luna 3 say it’s not possible to turn off manually,..it's probably because people are confused about how to turn it off. Pics compare the original Luna mini (teal) to the Luna 3 mini (black). The Luna 3’s bristles cover a bigger surface area, and the shape is more ergonomic.
